nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 27. West wind around 7 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow between 8am and noon, then snow likely and patchy fog between noon and 5pm, then patchy fog and rain and snow. Cloudy, with a high near 36. South wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and rain and snow before 8pm, then patchy fog and rain and snow between 8pm and 2am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of snow between 2am and 3am, then a slight chance of rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 31. Southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
